ARABIC: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُومٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It has seven gates and each gate has its allotted share.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Which has several gates, and each gate is marked for every section of them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There are seven gates in it, and to each gate a portion of them has been allotted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It has seven gates and each gate is assigned for a certain group of people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It has seven gates; for each gate is a portion assigned from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It has seven gates, for each of those gates is a class assigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It has seven gates; for every gate there shall be a separate party of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Seven gates it has, and unto each gate a set portion of them belongs.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It hath seven gates, and each gate hath an appointed portion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it has seven gates: and each gate has a portion of them allotted to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto it are seven portals; unto each portal is a Portion of them assigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It has seven gates, and to each gate belongs a separate portion of them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To it are seven gates: for each of those gates is a (special) class (of sinners) assigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It (Hell) has seven gates, for each of those gates is a (special) class (of sinners) assigned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It has seven gates, and through each gate a portion of them belong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “It has seven doors; for each door is an assigned class.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:44] It has seven gates, [seven] layers — to each gate, therein, belongs an appointed portion, lot, of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It hath seven gates) some higher than others: its highest is Gehenna and lowest al-Hawiyah, (and each gate hath an appointed portion) each gate has a specific number of disbelievers who will enter it.
